description: Nova/test.py has a new dependency on option osapi_v3/enabled. Since nova/api/openstack may not have been imported by the time this option is used, we need to explicitly import the option at the top of the file.
title: nova/test needs to import osapi_v3/enabled

comments.content: Nova/test.py has a new dependency on option osapi_v3/enabled. Since nova/api/openstack may not have been imported by the time this option is used, we need to explicitly import the option at the top of the file.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/31804
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/31804
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/dbdd08466a89f4615a8321aaf70828d8d7341a23
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit dbdd08466a89f4615a8321aaf70828d8d7341a23
Author: Rick Harris <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jun 5 16:20:34 2013 +0000

    Import osapi_v3/enabled option in nova/test
    
    Since `nova/api/openstack` may not have been imported by the time we use this
    option in `nova/test`, we need to explicitly import it at the top of the file.
    
    Fixes bug 1187847
    
    Change-Id: Ibc9f3466d3baaf47d44bda2fc22247a494809909
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
